TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SchemaImporterExtension extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许在使用自动查询工具时自定义从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成的代码。

span.span: Allows you to customize the code generated from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document when using automated query tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过添加 Web 引用对话框等工具生成的 Web 服务代理时，会发生架构导入 Visual Studio 中，或通过使用找到的框[Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)。Schema importation occurs whenever a Web service proxy is produced through a tool such as the Add Web Reference dialog box found in Visual Studio, or by using the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88). 如果使用，也会出现架构导入[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)以便从特定的 XSD 文档生成代码。Schema importation also occurs when using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) to generate code from a specific XSD document. 类，可以修改时使用任何一种工具生成的代码。The class allows you to modify the code generated when using any of these tools. 例如，你可能具有现有的类，处理图书订单在系统上并且具有现有的 XSD 文档提供您的订单。For example, you may have an existing class that processes book orders on a system and you have an existing XSD document that supplies your orders. 使用类，你可以启用一种工具来生成使用您的类的代码。Using the class, you can enable one of the tools to generate code that uses your class. 若要控制的代码生成，你必须使用中找到的类命名空间。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx). 启用 WSDL.exe 工具 （这反过来使用其他工具，如添加 Web 引用对话框中） 以使用你的扩展的步骤如下：The steps to enabling the WSDL.exe tool (which in turn is used by other tools such as the Add Web Reference dialog box) to use your extension are: 1. 创建的实现类。Create an implementation of the class. 2. 使用方法来为代码生成器编写代码。Use the method to write code for the code generator. 包含参数，可用于检查截获的 XSD 类型，并创建 CodeDOM 对象，它用于生成新的 CLR 代码的方法。The method contains parameters that allow you to examine the intercepted XSD type and create CodeDOM objects that are used to generate the new CLR code. 3. 如果需要，使用方法以处理\ XSD 文档中找到的元素。If required, use the method to handle \ elements found in the XSD document. 4. 如果需要，使用方法可检查默认值在 XSD 文档中找到和返回不同的默认值。If required, use the method to examine default values found in the XSD document and return a different default value. 5. 到库编译你的扩展。Compile your extension into a library. 6. 程序集签名。Sign the assembly. 7. 安装程序集在全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中。Install the assembly in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC). 8. 修改 machine.config 文件中包括扩展名。Modify the machine.config file to include the extension. ## Examples 请参阅[SchemaImporterExtension 技术示例](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample.md)。See the [SchemaImporterExtension Technology Sample](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample.md). 请注意，此示例不包含签名的程序集。Note that this example does not include a signed assembly. 相反，它演示了如何使用与命令窗口。Instead, it demonstrates how to use the with a command window.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: SchemaImporterExtension();

Public Overridable Function ImportAnyElement (any As XmlSchemaAny, mixed As Boolean, schemas As XmlSchemas, importer As XmlSchemaImporter, compileUnit As CodeCompileUnit, mainNamespace As CodeNamespace, options As CodeGenerationOptions, codeProvider As CodeDomProvider) As String

public: virtual System::String ^ ImportAnyElement(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaAny ^ any, bool mixed, System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemas ^ schemas, System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemaImporter ^ importer, System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ compileUnit, System::CodeDom::CodeNamespace ^ mainNamespace, System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions options, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ codeProvider);

param.name: any
param.span: 一个 ，表示在 XML 架构文档 (XSD) 中找到的 元素。

span.span: An that represents the element found in the XML Schema Document (XSD).

param.name: mixed
param.span: ，指示 XSD 特性是否已设置为“mixed”。

span.span: A that indicates whether the XSD attribute has been set to "mixed".

param.span: 如果该特性已设置为“mixed”，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: , if the attribute has been set to mixed, otherwise .

param.name: schemas
param.span: ，包含 XSD 中的架构的集合。

span.span: An that contains the collection of schemas found in the XSD.

param.name: importer
param.span: 正在使用的导入程序 。

span.span: The that is the importer being used.

param.name: compileUnit
param.span: ，可向其添加 CodeDOM 结构以生成 XSD 的备选代码。

span.span: A to which you can add CodeDOM structures to generate alternative code for the XSD.

param.name: mainNamespace
param.span: 表示元素的当前命名空间的 。

span.span: A that represents the current namespace for the element.

param.name: options
param.span: 用于代码编译器的设置选项的 。

span.span: A for the setting options on the code compiler.

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: ，用来生成新代码的 CodeDOM 提供程序。

span.span: A that is the CodeDOM provider used to generate the new code.

summary.span: 处理架构中的 <xsd:any> 元素的导入。

span.span: Handles the importation of the <xsd:any> elements in the schema.

returns.span: 该元素映射到的 CLR 类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the CLR type that the element maps to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制的代码生成，你必须使用中找到的类命名空间。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.CodeDom.CodeExpression ImportDefaultValue (string value, string type);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeExpression ImportDefaultValue(string value, string type) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ImportDefaultValue (value As String, type As String) As CodeExpression
public: virtual System::CodeDom::CodeExpression ^ ImportDefaultValue(System::String ^ value, System::String ^ type);

param.name: value
param.span: 原始 XSD 中的值。

span.span: The value found in the original XSD.

param.name: type
param.span: XSD 类型名称。

span.span: The XSD type name.

summary.span: 允许为正在导入的 XSD 类型指定默认值。

span.span: Allows you to specify the default value for the XSD type being imported.
A setting the new default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制的代码生成，你必须使用中找到的类命名空间。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).

summary.span: 允许您检查导入的架构并指定该架构映射到的 CLR 类型，从而对生成的代码进行操作。

span.span: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示的简单实现方法。The example below shows a simple implementation of the method. 代码将检查命名空间和名称。The code checks the namespace and name. 找到正确的值，它会添加自定义程序集的名称 ("Order.dll") 必须引用生成的代码中。When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code. 然后，它将添加新的命名空间 ("Microsoft.Samples") 在代码中生成。It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code. [!code-csharp[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/CS/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/VB/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制的代码生成，你必须使用中找到的类命名空间。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示的简单实现方法。The example below shows a simple implementation of the method. 代码将检查命名空间和名称。The code checks the namespace and name. 找到正确的值，它会添加自定义程序集的名称 ("Order.dll") 必须引用生成的代码中。When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code. 然后，它将添加新的命名空间 ("Microsoft.Samples") 在代码中生成。It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code.
